HomePage.title: The <gradient>Full-Stack</gradient> Developer.
HomePage.paragraph: I make accessible, high-performance websites with strong SEO and clean code. My portfolio is in the development process; in the meantime, feel free to contact me via email, GitHub, and LinkedIn.
HomePage.description: Furkan Eryılmaz is a skilled full-stack developer with extensive experience in creating high-performance, SEO-friendly websites. Proficient in modern frameworks like Next.js, SvelteKit, and Laravel, he specializes in front-end and back-end development, responsive design, and optimizing web applications for speed and usability. His expertise includes multilingual website creation, web performance optimization, and integrating advanced technologies to deliver user-friendly digital solutions.
